homepage.subtitle: Production of websites, apps and digital presence

about.title: About me
about.description:
Hi there,
I'm thrilled to have you here! I hope you're doing great. My name is André Rodrigues and I'm a software engineer and designer for over 4 years. From the moment I turned my passion for technology into a career, I've been dedicated to building digital projects that push the boundaries while keeping the user at the heart of everything I do. I’m all about the details—crafting creative, tailor-made solutions that truly enhance the user experience.
Over the years, I’ve worked with incredible people across various industries, designing websites, developing web apps, and shaping brands. My goal? To build meaningful relationships and bring visions to life with impactful, top-tier products.
Feel free to explore more about my path and projects, and don't hesitate to reach out. I'm always eager to connect and explore how we can collaborate. Let's chat!

contact.description: I'm always eager to connect with new people and explore how we can collaborate. Let's get in touch!

categories.websites: Cutting-edge websites and web apps that blend innovation with user-centric solutions to boost engagement and business growth.
categories.apps: Apps offering seamless user experiences across devices with optimal performance and reliability.
categories.design: Designs that captivate and inspire, setting the stage for a memorable and engaging user journey.

heroSection.title: Helping you seamlessly build online solutions
heroSection.description: With so many options available, its easy to get overwhelmed. My role is to help you navigate the digital landscape and bring your vision to life.

contact.description: I'm always eager to connect with new people and explore how we can collaborate. Let's get in touch!

web.heroTitle: The Internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow.
web.description:
I have always strived to create websites that are not only aesthetically pleasing but also intuitive and user-friendly. I believe that the integration of modern technologies and frameworks has allowed me to achieve this goal while also enhancing the performance of the websites that I develop.
In this section, you'll find personal and client projects where I've utilized a range of modern technologies such as React, Redux, Next JS, Web basics, Figma, Sketch and Affinity to create visually stunning and functionally-rich websites.
I hope that you will enjoy the websites as much as I enjoyed developing them!

projects.title: Projects
projects.CDEFF: Welcome to the Francisco Franco Sports Club project! Score big with the first website of a local sports club in Madeira Island. Dive into the latest updates on club activities, explore insightful blog articles, and find detailed information on tournaments. It's more than just a website; it's your ultimate playbook for all things sports-related!
projects.PrimeTravel: Check out PrimeTravel, the ultimate travel agency sidekick! It's not just a tool; it's a showcase of top-notch Fullstack Developer skills, designed to wow recruiters and managers. Think of it as your personal assistant for running your travel biz like a breeze. So, if you're in the travel game and craving an easier life, PrimeTravel's your golden ticket to success!
projects.bb: Dive into Barbara Lawyer's website, a testament to professionalism and empathy. It's not just about legal prowess; it's a digital handshake that says, 'I understand.' With sleek design and intuitive navigation, this site speaks volumes. Plus, it's packed with SEO magic and analytics to ensure it reaches those who need it most.
projects.carolina: Step into serenity with Carolina Jardim's website. Designed with empathy at its core, it's more than just a digital space; it's a calming sanctuary. From soothing colors to seamless navigation, every element whispers reassurance. And behind the scenes, powerful analytics and SEO wizardry ensure it touches hearts far and wide.
projects.blog: Welcome to my personal blog, where every click leads to discovery. This isn't your average blog; it's a treasure trove of tech, finance, and career insights. With features like filtering, searching, and a handy CMS, it's a reader's paradise. Plus, with analytics and SEO mojo under the hood, it's bound to make waves in the digital realm.
projects.barber: Ready for a cut above the rest? Barber Studio's website is more than just a showcase; it's a canvas for barbering mastery. From crisp designs to dynamic portfolios, it's a nod to skill and style. And with analytics and SEO smarts, it's primed to attract the sharpest clients in town.
projects.it: Step into the digital playground of IT Studios. This isn't your run-of-the-mill company site; it's a showcase of innovation and creativity. From sleek app displays to client testimonials, it's a testament to tech prowess. And with analytics and SEO finesse, it's sure to catch the eye of both recruiters and potential partners.
projects.Memory: Get ready to exercise your brain with the Memory Game web app. Whether you're challenging friends or battling the computer, fun awaits. With scoreboards, multiplayer options, and slick design, it's a gaming experience like no other. Plus, with analytics and SEO superpowers, it's set to dominate the online gaming scene.
projects.pipedrive: Pipedrive is an Estonian cloud-based software as a service company. It is the developer of the web application and mobile app Pipedrive, a sales customer relationship management tool. The company has more than 1,000 employees in its eight offices across Europe and two offices in the US.
projects.navro: Navro helps businesses navigate their growth into foreign markets by providing them with access to the best payments infrastructure around the world through one contract and one API.
projects.sky: Peacock is an American over-the-top subscription streaming service owned and operated by Peacock TV, LLC, a subsidiary of NBCUniversal Media Group.
projects.probely: Probely is a web application and API vulnerability scanner for agile teams. Automate Security Testing by adding Probely into your SDLC and CI/CD pipelines.

mobile.heroTitle: Mobile will ultimately be the way you provision most of your services.
mobile.description:
I am excited to showcase some of my personal projects specifically focused on mobile apps! As technology continues to advance, mobile devices have become an essential part of our daily lives, and developing mobile apps has become an increasingly important skill in the tech industry.
Here you'll find some of my mobile apps projects, where I've utilized modern technologies and frameworks such as React Native.
So, take a look around, and please feel free to contact me if you have any questions or feedback. Thank you for visiting!

projects.title: Projects
projects.giggle: Need a good laugh? Giggle! has got you covered! Dive into a world of endless laughter with our hilarious collection of jokes, puns, and funny stories. Whether you're feeling down or just in need of a pick-me-up, Giggle! is here to brighten your day and leave you smiling from ear to ear. Get ready to LOL your way through the day!
projects.randombox: Get ready for a whirlwind of excitement with Random Box! It's the ultimate challenge generator that brings a new thrill to your fingertips every day. From crazy dares to quirky tasks, you never know what surprise awaits inside the box! Gather your friends and embark on an adventure filled with laughter, spontaneity, and endless fun. Stay tuned for the grand unveiling!
projects.coolmind: Welcome to Coolmind, your ultimate companion for positive vibes and a healthy mindset! Say goodbye to stress and negativity as Coolmind guides you through uplifting exercises, gratitude practices, and mindfulness techniques. Harness the power of positivity and unleash your inner joy! Get ready to transform your mind, one smile at a time!

about.heroTitle: You’ve got to start with the customer experience and work back towards the technology.

branding.title: Branding
branding.description: Would you also like to create or recreate your brand image? No problem! For an attractive price, we include branding in the package.

about_me.title: About me
about_me.description:
I love this quote by Steve Jobs. This idea has guided me since the day I turned my passion for technology into my career path. I'm all in when it comes to building digital projects and constantly learning new things to keep pushing the envelope, but its so easy to forget the user in the process. That's why I'm big on the little things, dreaming up creative ways to view the world, and diving deep into the details, so I can craft tailor-made solutions that have a true impact on the user experience.
Over the years, I've had the privilege to work across various industries with truly amazing people, focusing primarily on designing websites, developing web apps, and shaping brands. More than anything, my aim is to build lasting and meaningful relationships while help bringing visions to life with top-notch products that truly make a difference.

experience.title: Build lasting and meaningful relationships
experience.description:
Throughout my career, I've been privileged to contribute to a range of impactful projects across several leading companies, each offering unique challenges and learning opportunities. Currently, at Probely, I refined their cybersecurity products with intuitive features using React & TypeScript, enhancing user satisfaction and product efficiency.
My roles at Navro and Pipedrive allowed me to deeply engage in software reliability and system optimization, implementing robust solutions and comprehensive testing regimes that elevated operational performance.
At NBCUniversal's Peacock, I took pride in ensuring a seamless streaming experience for millions of users worldwide, contributing to a scalable and responsive service.
My journey at Wise was particularly rewarding, as I led the development of an online lottery platform from the ground up, aligning our technical solutions closely with client needs and market demands. This role not only challenged my skills but also deepened my appreciation for collaborative solution development.

contact.title: get in touch today
contact.description: I'm always eager to connect with new people and explore how we can collaborate. Let's get in touch!

skills.heroTitle: Knowledge is the eye of desire and the pilot of the soul.
skills.title: overview
skills.description:
Arts and human-behavior had always been a huge part of my life. Through my other passions like theatre, music, and psychology have profoundly shaped my emotional and professional growth, enriching my skills in communication and teamwork.
The charts here tho, highlight my expertise in front-end and back-end development and infrastructure. Yet, this is just a glimpse of my capabilities. I'm also experienced in other topics like microservices and event-driven architecture, webpack among others. I'm always eager to learn and adapt to new technologies, so this is just the beginning of my journey.

cdeff.review: André developed our website and we are very pleased with the final result! The design is modern and appealing, the navigation is intuitive, and the website is responsive. André is an excellent professional, very dedicated and attentive to details. We definitely recommend his work!

barbara.review: André developed my website and I couldn't be happier with the result! The design is modern and professional, the navigation is intuitive, and the website is responsive. André is an excellent professional, very dedicated and attentive to details. His work comes with my highest recommendation!

sofia.review: André created a website for our General and Family Medicine Interns Meeting and it exceeded our expectations! His empathy and creativity won us over in the first meeting and since then we've been continuously positively surprised. Now we count on him for future RIMA editions!

ana.review: I had the pleasure of working with André, witnessing his expertise as a Frontend Engineer. In the dynamic setting of an early-stage startup, working with a compact design team, André not only thrived but was an unwavering support to our team. His human qualities and attention to detail is a gem in our industry, and I'm confident he'll succeed in any challenge ahead!

nkem.review: I had the privilege of working with André as part of a Frontend development team, and he is a great person to work with. He stands out for his commitment and exceptional problem solving skills. André always goes above and beyond, with a positive attitude that inspired the team and pushed us to meet our targets!

anaJardim.review: I'm so grateful for André Rodrigues' exceptional work on my psychology website. His care for my vision and professional expertise shine through the minimalist design. A true collaborator who brought my perspectives to life seamlessly. Thank you, André!

vlad.review: I’ve had the pleasure of collaborating with Andre Rodrigues and I am continually impressed by his exceptional communication skills and remarkable ability to grasp complex topics with ease. Andre’s proactive nature to exceed expectations is not just a testament to his work ethic, but also a significant advantage for our entire team.

rafa.review: André developed my website, IT Studios. His modern and minimalist design, with special attention to the user experience, made the website highly intuitive. I couldn't be more pleased with the final result. If you want to create an appealing and functional website, I highly recommend his work!

ahmad.review: Working with Andre as his team lead was a real pleasure. He's a standout developer, with curiosity, bringing automation and always up for new challenges with great analysis skills to ensure longevity. His combination of technical know-how, teamwork, and a knack for simplifying complex ideas is rare. I would recommend him for any frontend development role.

doart.review: I want to give a special thank you to André for the work he has done on my album cover and logo! Make sure to check out his website to view his incredible portfolio — you won't be disappointed!

404.title: Page not found

analytics_banner.description: This website uses Google Analytics to understand human interaction. Therefore, by continuing to use this website, you consent to the use of cookies to track and analyze your usage.
